name: Sinkhole Ooze
movement: 20 ft. walking, 40 ft. burrowing, 20 ft. climbing
description: The Sinkhole Ooze is a massive, amorphous blob that blends into the earth, designed to ensnare unsuspecting creatures that come too close.
memorable: Its ability to create hollow cylindrical forms allows it to trap creatures inside while remaining indistinguishable from the ground.
goals: To ensnare and digest creatures that venture into its space.
relations: Similar to other oozes and could be encountered alongside other subterranean creatures.
environment: Typically found in subterranean environments like pits or sinkholes.
strengths: Resilient to damage, with multiple pseudopods for grappling and mobility advantage through shaping its form.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class of 7 makes it susceptible to physical attacks.
attacks: Pseudopod attacks that deal bludgeoning and acid damage while grappling targets.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to stretch its body into a hollow cylinder, controlling the battlefield and trapping enemies.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without sight.
skills: Has a low passive perception score of 8.
additional_information: Does not require sleep, remaining active.
Can extrude replacement pseudopods quickly when destroyed.
Grabs creatures falling into its cylinder with a Pluck reaction.
Immunity to acid damage enhances its survivability.
Can navigate tight spaces due to its Amorphous trait.
test_queries: sticky blob that grapples unsuspecting adventurers
ooze that blends into the ground
creature with pseudopods and acid attacks
